column4: Would anyone know how to set 56000bps a-link external voice-faxmodem with a conexant chipset from 9600bps to 56000bps? It doesn't say anywhere that it's 9600bps. But firefox dowloads maximum of 900bytes/s and synaptic too. anyone, help?
look for the file describing your connexion
: it's ppp0. I tried pppconfig before and it didn't help.
bash: /etc/ppp/peers: is a directory what command should I use? I'm a newbie with linux. :)
to the last line? no matter where?
ok, did that. do I have to save somewhere or make it apply?
thank you stpere. that should do it? See you soon. :)
